title: Armor of Guile
contents: property | Light | DC 30 Wis save per encounter

description | Illusion |  Any and all attack rolls against the wearer are made at against an AC representative of an illusory armor the wearer desires.  On a successful save the wearer appears to have an ugly pink and green scarf around their midsection
description | Resistance | Every resistance added to the armor decreases the DC by 5
description | Remove | Removing armor or putting other armor on gives all the observers a new save with adv.

title: Armor of Protection
contents: property | Resistance | DR of twice PC class level

description | Thickens |  On damage greater than twice the PC's class level, the armor thickens and stiffens, the lining swells and pads the body, the leathers thicken into rope-like cords, the metal becomes dense and hard and expands in thickness.
description | Grappled | Grappled condition is applied by the armor till end of next turn, if attacked a DEX save against half of the damage and if failed he is prone till end of next turn.

title: Aubritan's Sacrifice
contents: property | Sacrifice |  May trade HP (bearer's must be highter) up to the target's max, may remove any disease, paralysis, petrification, poisoning, curse, or other inflicted condition and take it on himself.

description | Usage |  Use an action to cut the palm of another creature and their own, the knife bearer may grasp hands with that creature and take on the Sacrifice both take 1 damage.  May use Sacrifice ability next turn.
description | Refresh | The knife bearer may use once per day, refreshes at dawn. Each use grants 1 inspiration.

title: Bag of Horror
contents: property | Toss |  Using one's 'draw or stow', you can pull out a handful of these little creatures and as a bonus action may toss them in front of you (range 5/10) and command them toward an enemy--they hit doing 1d4+1 fire damage. Dex save for half.
description | Fireflies |  A bag where necromantic fireflies have been conjured to breed endlessly and so the little sack is always half full of tiny, glowing, moving little dead bugs
description | Refresh | Bag holds 3 handfuls, replenesh full after long rest.

title: Billowing Cloak of Father Wind
contents: property | Movement |  All movement in 10 ft. radius sphere is difficult terrain, effects the wearer as well
property | Push |  Enemy entering the sphere and at start of turn must make a Str save DC10 or 'shoved' by wind 5ft in direction the PC wants--no reaction attack.
property | Projectiles | +2 AC against ranged attacks.

description | Effects |  Donning requires full action. Escape Artist DC15 to untie. Suffocation rules. Can hold breath for 1 + Con mod minutes (min 30 sec). Out of breath, survive Con mod rounds (min 1). At start of next round drop to 0 hp and start dying.  If PC suffers critical hit, grappled, shoved, falls, or knocked prone, roll Con save DC15. On failure, cease holding their breath.

title: Box of Princely Comeliness
contents: property | Disguise |  With care and effort the PC may roll a Wisdom check and replace their Charisma score with the result of that roll (they do not have to) up to a maximum of 20.  Only usable once per day. After 1 day, the Charisma goes back to normal or if washed off.
description | Description | It is filled with make-ups and powders, blushes and rouges, small bottles of scented oils and perfumes. A comprehensive, magical make-up box.
description | Recharge | Box replenshes its stock of powders, oils, lotions, and accessories once a day

title: Brucker's Pipe
contents: property | Contested Rolls |  The pipe is an arcane focus, only for Warlocks of an Arch-Fey, and gives advantage on any rolls against other Warlocks (of any Patron) on contested rolls. Every time such a roll is made, add a counter to the pipe (so long as someone possesses it).

description | Rests | Every time a long rest is taken, the possessor of the pipe takes an amount of Psychic damage equal to the counter of the pipe. This does not interfere with their long rest and they will heal damage normally otherwise.

title: Slipquick Silks
contents: description | Description | The silks are leggings, long shirt, gloves, and cloth slippers all in deeply dyed charcoal grey.

description | Attunement | Requires a morning calisthenic routine, (Acrobatics DC 10). Takes several hours first time, can be maintained daily with no check with only 20 minutes of routine. Failure to keep schedule results in unattuning.

description | Properties | Allows the wearer to escape grapples at ADV., avoid being shoved at ADV., squeeze through narrow spaces without movement penalties, avoid damage from falling objects (75% they slip past the wearer). If slipped from attempted grapple or shove they may use their reaction like the attacker moved out of a space the wearer threatens.

title: Coward's Shield
contents: property | Modifier | +0 for the purposes of resistances and invulnerabilities
description | Description | The Coward’s Shield is a pair of gloves with enchanted steel plates on the palms.
description | Attunement | Attuned by surviving a critical hit.

description | Properties | The wearer may use a Reaction to activate an unseen barrier between them and one foe after taking a Disengage action. This barrier raises their AC by +4 and goes away at the end of their turn.

title: Liar's Dice
contents: property | Roll | Roll 3d6, on 3 may make one minor lie told day previous true and real.  On 18 the dice no longer work for the owner.
description | Description | They’re heavy and dark grey and while unusual they don’t actually have any sign of being truly special.

title: Fiddle of the Mad God
contents: property | 1st turn | On the first turn playing, at the end of the turn, everyone within 60ft. feels a tingle at the base of their spine.

property | 2nd turn | At the end of the turn, all creatures within 60ft. suffer from difficult terrain (except the player) that can not be overcome by other class features or abilities–though spells that grant movement may counteract this.
property | 3-9 turns | On the third through 9th turn, this effect remains for all within earshot.
property | 10th turn | At the end of the 10th turn, everyone within earshot takes 4 exhaustion and may resume normal movement and activities.
description | Description | The song is always the same. A slow, droning hum and scraping.

title: Zephyr Spines
contents: property | Reaction | After a Reaction is declared by any other player or the DM for a creature in response to something in the combat, the Spines wielder may pre-empt that Reaction with one of their own. Must employ the use of the Spines in some way.

property | Attunement | Requires a leap (from something high) and fall (for at least 100 ft.) unassisted by any magic. To minimize the potential damage, it was common in those days to leap into a lake or river.
description | Description | There are two, each a fifteen inch length of polished white bone, as big around as a finger, lighter than there is any noticeable reason for.

title: Trapper’s Bowcrook
contents: property | Grapple | With a successful Grapple Action using the weapon (hooking them around a body part—most likely their neck), one may focus on holding the tangle for one full round. During this time, all attacks have advantage on the wielder,

property | Hover | With an action, on their next turn, if the grapple condition is still in place, the bowcrook flies away from the wielder (in the direction the target is) up to 30 ft. while still grappling the creature. If there is a wall within that distance, the bowcrook magically hovers, grappling them to the wall without being held (they take 1d6 for every 10 ft of travel upon hitting a wall). If there is no wall, at 30ft. the bowcrook falls away from the target and the grapple is ended.
